Text: Interested in joining your Monterrey Mexico operationpst Louise During todays all employee meeting you mentioned that you were looking at some growth in your Monterrey office Here are my qualifications years of energy related asset operations experience years of operating cogen facilities procuring power and gas Coupled with years of regulatory advocacy in the California market year EES Account Director for OwensIllinois BS Electrical Engineering MBA Finance and Law Degree Fluent Spanish and Dual USMexican Citizenship Attached please find my resume for your consideration in filling positions for the Mexican market Look forward to hearing from you Regards Tony Valenzuela Director Account Enron Energy Services
